sentence.Network_en: Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration.
sentence.Network_cn: 价格因具体配置而异，从119美元至199美元不等。

sentence.Network_en: I tend to have a different answer, depending on the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据家庭的不同，我往往会给出不同的答案。

sentence.Network_en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentence.Network_cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

entry.def: If you say that one thing depends on another, you mean that the first thing will be affected or determined by the second.

example.ex: The cooking time needed depends on the size of the potato...
example.tran: 所需的烹饪时间取决于土豆的大小。

example.ex: What happened later would depend on his talk with De Solina...
example.tran: 日后之事将有赖于他与德索利纳的谈话结果。

entry.def: If you depend on someone or something, you need them in order to be able to survive physically, financially, or emotionally.

example.ex: They may hate what he does but their survival depends on him...
example.tran: 他们或许讨厌他的营生，但他们要想活下来必须依靠他。

example.ex: He depended on his writing for his income...

entry.def: If you can depend on a person, organization, or law, you know that they will support you or help you when you need them.

example.ex: 'You can depend on me,' Cross assured him.
example.tran: “你可以信赖我，”克罗斯向他保证。

entry.def: You use depend in expressions such as it depends to indicate that you cannot give a clear answer to a question because the answer will be affected or determined by other factors.

example.ex: 'But how long can you stay in the house?' – 'I don't know. It depends.'...
example.tran: “但你能在这所房子里呆多久呢？”——“我不知道，这要看情况。”

example.ex: It all depends on your definition of punk, doesn't it?
example.tran: “这全视乎你对朋克摇滚乐的定义，不是吗？”

entry.def: You use depending on when you are saying that something varies according to the circumstances mentioned.

example.ex: I tend to have a different answer, depending on the family...
example.tran: 根据家庭的不同，我往往会给出不同的答案。

example.ex: People in the rest of the country celebrated independence even later, depending on when the news of Congress's action reached them.
example.tran: 该国其他地区的人们庆祝独立的时间甚至更晚，这要取决于有关国会决定的消息何时传到了他们那里。
